panels.description: Shows rate of requests against /query for the given time.

targets.expr: sum by (job, handler, code) (increase(http_requests_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", handler="query"}[1m]))

panels.title: Requests Rate / min

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests against /query.

targets.expr: sum by (job, code) (increase(http_requests_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", handler="query",code=~"5.."}[1m])) / ignoring (code) group_left() sum by (job) (increase(http_requests_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", handler="query"}[1m]))

panels.title: Requests Errors / min

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (increase(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", handler="query"}[1m])))

panels.title: Latency 99th Percentile

panels.description: Shows rate of requests against /query_range for the given time range.

targets.expr: sum by (job, handler, code) (increase(http_requests_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", handler="query_range"}[1m]))

panels.title: Requests Rate /min

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests against /query_range.

targets.expr: sum by (job, code) (increase(http_requests_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", handler="query_range",code=~"5.."}[1m])) / ignoring (code) group_left() sum by (job) (increase(http_requests_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", handler="query_range"}[1m]))

panels.title: Requests Errors /min

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (increase(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", handler="query_range"}[1m])))

panels.title: Latency 99th Percentile

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Unary gRPC requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_method, grpc_code) (increase(grpc_server_handled_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", grpc_type="unary"}[1m]))

panels.title: gRPC (Unary) Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_code) (increase(grpc_server_handled_total{grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",grpc_type="unary"}[1m])) / ignoring (grpc_code) group_left() sum by (job) (increase(grpc_server_handled_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", grpc_type="unary"}[1m]))

panels.title: gRPC (Unary) Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests from queriers.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (increase(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", grpc_type="unary"}[1m])))

panels.title: gRPC Latency 99th Percentile

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Unary gRPC requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_method, grpc_code) (increase(grpc_server_handled_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", grpc_type="unary"}[1m]))

panels.title: gRPC (Unary) Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_code) (increase(grpc_server_handled_total{grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",grpc_type="unary"}[1m])) / ignoring (grpc_code) group_left() sum by (job) (increase(grpc_server_handled_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", grpc_type="unary"}[1m]))

panels.title: gRPC (Unary) Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests from queriers, in quantiles.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (increase(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", grpc_type="unary"}[1m])))

panels.title: gRPC (Unary) Latency 99th Percentile

panels.description: Shows rate of incoming requests.

targets.expr: sum by (job, handler, code) (increase(http_requests_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", handler="receive"}[1m]))

panels.title: Incoming Requests Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled incoming requests.

targets.expr: sum by (job, code) (increase(http_requests_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", handler="receive",code=~"5.."}[1m])) / ignoring (code) group_left() sum by (job) (increase(http_requests_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", handler="receive"}[1m]))

panels.title: Incoming Requests Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle incoming requests.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (increase(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", handler="receive"}[1m])))

panels.title: Incoming Requests Latency 99th Percentile

panels.description: Shows rate of alerts that successfully sent to alert manager.

targets.expr: sum by (job, alertmanager) (rate(thanos_alert_sender_alerts_sent_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", }[1m]))

panels.title: Alert Sent Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of sent alerts.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_alert_sender_errors_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", }[1m])) / sum by (job) (rate(thanos_alert_sender_alerts_sent_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", }[1m]))

panels.title: Alert Sent Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to send alerts to alert manager.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_alert_sender_latency_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", }[1m])))

panels.title: Alert Sent Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of execution for compactions against blocks that are stored in the bucket.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (increase(thanos_compact_group_compactions_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m]))

panels.title: Compaction Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of executed compactions against blocks that are stored in the bucket.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (increase(thanos_compact_group_compactions_failures_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m])) / sum by (job) (increase(thanos_compact_group_compactions_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m]))

panels.title: Compaction Errors
